-e ---

𓋴 𓂋 𓃱 giraffe gira™ great groß երկար jɛɾkɑɾ გრძელი ɡrd͡zɛli ǧira šira
𓋴 𓂋 𓃱 | giraffe | 𒁍 SÍR √groß high Hohes Tier 𓋴 𓂋 𓀔 𓀀 | nobleman, magistrate | граф Graf ≈ Giraffe 𓋴 𓂋 𓀔 𓀀 | nobleman, magistrate | सरदार sardar signore Syrer ™

SIR 𒁍 | stretched, long |
ṣir 𒈲 great 𒈲𒋾 ṣirti exalted

𒌋𒌋 sir zar 𒌋𒌋𒎌 ṣarani "kings"

𓋴 𓇋 𓎛 𓃶 < 𒃻𒄣𒋾 šá-qu-ti šáquti "high"
𓋴 𓇋 𓎛 𓃶 | noble | šarīf شريف <> sheep 𓋴 𓂝 𓎛 𓃶 | honour | sharaf@Cush ღირსება ghirseba - dignity 𓋴 𓇋 𓎛 𓃶 | exalted | 𒍢𒊏𒀀𒋾 ṣi-ra-a-ti
𓋴 𓇋 𓎛 𓃶 syrer > sir : noble, exalted (one) 𒍢𒊒 ṣiru 𒍢𒋥 ṣirat
𓊃𓂝𓎛𓋩𓏛 syrer ⇔ zar 𒊬𒊑 šarri shar sultan (king)
𓊃𓂝𓎛𓋩𓏛 syrer ⇔ sacha, sacro-sankt
𓍿𓂋𓀀𓁐𓏥 syrer : human ⇔ cyrer kurden german kaiman 𓍿𓂋

𓋴 𓍿 𓄿 𓋴 𓏲 | stretched | ≈

𒁍 SÍR sehr reich "rich" siôr@Romance sir@Elamite ⇔ 𓋴 𓇋 𓎛 𓃶 noble Syrer syrian
𒁍 SÍR siôr ⇔ sieur sire sir < senior ??
𒁍 SÍR ⇔ 𒍢𒊒 ṣi-ru@Akkad "exalted"

𓋴 𓂋 𓃱 𓂻 | show (something, someone) | gir@Lith! share! 𓋴 𓂋 𓏮 𓃱 | foretell, make known | graph @Seher

ⲟⲩⲣⲟ , ϥ. ⲟⲩⲣⲱ , pl. ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲟⲩ m king, f. queen •Sir (ⲟ=𐤏) ⇔ Zar
ⲟⲩⲣⲟ < ⲣ̄ⲣⲟ ᵖᵃr̄ro ⲫⲁⲣⲁⲱ (pharaō), Hebrew פַּרְעֹה and Ancient Greek φαραώ pharaṓ pharaoh
